CFS Scheduler Requirements

The following is the main SCH subsystem requirement. Detailed requirements can be found in the Scheduler Application Requirements Document.

CFS-400: The FSW shall support a table driven Time Division Multiplexed (TDM) Input/Output Scheme for scheduling system activities.
